title: Scheduled maintenance
message: We will be performing updates to iNZight Lite from December 20 to December 22, 2023. During this time, iNZight Lite may be unavailable or unstable.

title: Scheduled maintenance
message: We are currently performing maintenance updates to iNZight Lite. If iNZight Lite becomes unavailable or unstable and you urgently need access, use the back-up version at lite-vuw.up.railway.app. Please note that this version has lower resources and may be slower than usual.

title: New Release 2023.06
message: Last month we released the June update for iNZight Lite. This update includes a number of new features and bug fixes. For more information, see the change log.

title: Ongoing server issues
message: We are aware of a server issue causing some users to be disconnected. Please try hard-refreshing the page every 5 minutes. Let us know if you're consistently unable to connect. Thank you for your patience.

title: Back-up for UoA students
message: If you are having trouble accessing Lite for an assessment, we have a back-up version available at lite-uoa-stats.up.railway.app. This version has lower resources and may be slower than usual - please only use it if the main version is not working after trying to troubleshooting steps.

title: Looking for new update testers
message: We are looking for users to test the latest updates to iNZight Lite. If you are interested, simply use the developmental version at lite-staging.inzight.nz. Please report any issues you encounter to the iNZight team.
